title: Friends
creator_credit: Peter Van Deusen and Churchill Films
brief_description: Looks at the concept of friendship. The story involves three girls - one, a possessive girl, another with an extroverted nature and the third who is seen by the first girl to threaten the friendship. The film is open-ended and relates to the social studies theme of “cultural influences”. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
